volumeInfo.title: Lavender Essential Oil
volumeInfo.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know about This Wonderful Essential Oil
volumeInfo.description: Transform your health with the complete guide to Lavender Essential Oil! Get 2 FREE Ebooks with this guide The 10 Most Important Essential Oils, A Detailed Guide, AND The Ultimate Guide To Vitamins Master the powerful natural abilities of lavender essential oil with this complete guide. Lavender is well regarded as a brilliant aid in stress relief and improving sleep. Did you know it can also be used to treat acne, relieve fevers, reduce the symptoms of arthritis, repel insects and act as a brilliant deodorant? I could go on and on with an endless list of lavenders powerful therapeutic applications. It truly is a health powerhouse. Many aromatherapists agree that lavender should be the cornerstone of anybody's essential oil collection due to the sheer versatility and ease of use. This book has been written to provide a full and thorough breakdown of lavender essential oil, ranging from its rich history to the modern day applications. Find out what the book contains below! Here is exactly what you will learn whilst reading this book A history of Lavender Essential Oil's use A breakdown of Lavender essential oils chemical composition The 24 key therapeutic properties of Lavender essential oil A detailed explanation of how the oil is extracted How to extract lavender essential oil at home including how to maximize the purity and yield Complete safety instructions when using Lavender essential oil How to apply essential oils to the body through massage, inhalation, ingestion and topical application The amazing health benefits of the oil 5 remedies using lavender essential oil exclusively, including stress relief and insomnia treatment 31 easy and effective recipe/remedy blends containing lavender oil for treating various ailments Cold and Flu remedy blend Headache treatment blend Jet lag blend Body detoxification blend Acne Treatment Blend Over 30 more incredibly helpful natural blends!

volumeInfo.title: Lavender
volumeInfo.subtitle: The Genus Lavandula
volumeInfo.description: Lavandula species are mainly grown for their essential oils, which are used in perfumery, cosmetics, food processing and aromatherapy products, and for their use as ornamental plants and ingredients in numerous cottage industry products. volumeInfo.title: Lavender Oil
volumeInfo.description: Lavender Oil - The All-Purpose Essential Oil Wonder Lavender Oil can be considered the "essential" essential oil because of its amazing properties and the effects it can have. Most people don't believe all the various things that you can use lavender oil for. One amazing thing about using lavender oil to treat problems that you would normally treat with store bought products is that lavender oil is all-natural. No longer do you have to worry about unnecessary, and potentially harmful, chemicals. Lavender oil is the main ingredient in many of the products you would buy at the store, so you can just cut out all the additional chemicals and go straight to the source for the cure! The uses and benefits of lavender oil are numerous, including first aid, skin care, and even helping you deal with any sleeping difficulties that you may have. So discover what thousands of others have already learned: lavender oil is the "essential" essential oil.

volumeInfo.title: The Effect of Topical Application of Lavender Essential Oil on the Intensity of Pain Caused by the Insertion of Dialysis Needles in Hemodialysis Patients: A Randomized Clinical Trial
volumeInfo.description: Background Patients undergoing hemodialysis experience constant fear and anxiety due to the pain of the insertion of dialysis needles, which might lead to certain physiological and psychological complications for them in the long term. It is therefore essential to control their pain through a simple, safe method. Objective The present study was conducted to determine the effect of the topical application of lavender essential oil on the intensity of pain during the insertion of dialysis needles in hemodialysis patients. Design This open crossover study was conducted on 34 hemodialysis patients with arteriovenous fistula (AVF) admitted to the dialysis unit of one of the hospitals of Semnan University of Medical Sciences in 2013. The intensity of pain was measured in all the patients in three different states during the insertion of arterial needles for hemodialysis: (1) The topical application of 100% lavender essential oil, (2) no intervention, (3) placebo (with water). Main outcome measures Pain intensity was measured in this study through the numeric rating scale (NRS) of pain. Results The findings showed that the mean ± SD of pain intensity was 2.91 ± 1.69 with the topical application of lavender, 4.59 ± 2.02 in the no intervention state and 4.18 ± 1.66 with the placebo state. Statistical tests showed a significant difference between the patients' intensity of pain in the three different states (p = 0.001). Conclusion Based on the findings of the study, the topical application of lavender decreases moderate intensities of pain during the insertion of dialysis needles. Accordingly, lavender oil may be an option to reduce pain by insertion of hemodialysis needles.

searchInfo.textSnippet: Background Patients undergoing hemodialysis experience constant fear and anxiety due to the pain of the insertion of dialysis needles, which might lead to certain physiological and psychological complications for them in the long term.
